body: Sometimes a character ends its movement while moving through a space where it's not allowed to stop. When that happens, put your miniature in the last legal position you occupied, or the closest legal position, if there's a legal position that's closer.
name: Accidentally Ending Movement in an Illegal Space
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Movement/Position/And Distance/Special Movement Rules/Accidentally Ending Movement in an Illegal Space
